about_the_game:
Treasure Tile is a unique role-playing experience that combines tactical mechanics with real-time hack and slash gameplay in a rich and deep procedurally-generated world.

Will you let the Island guide you to your true purpose, or will you fight against it?

Tile-based hack and slash action

Treasure Tile fuses the strategic possibilities of a tile-based game with the fast-paced action of real-time hack and slash into a completely unique blend. Dodge, reposition and strike to unleash satisfying tile crumbling plays.

Any skill you can imagine

Collect rare crystals and use them to shape your skills in any way imaginable! Conjure shields that stun, arrows that heal, never-ending meteor showers and so much more. Poisonous burning lightning storms!

An ever-shifting land

Delve into the mysteries of the Land of Ero, a realm constantly changing and rearranging. With each time you enter the paths, enemies and even special events are randomized in this hand-painted procedurally generated world.

Hundreds of Items

Explore and fight for powerful items and unique relics. Craft, upgrade and enhance your gear to create your ideal build and play style.

A land on the brink of war

Uncover the history and stories of Ero, meet many interesting and unique characters on your quest. As the factions of Treasure Tile gather strength, it is up to you to prevent war.
